body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Scott's Car Dealership. My name is Albert Scott. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Kathleen. Could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five two two two nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. And could you also confirm your address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. It's one two three Main Street, Anytown, USA.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, Kathleen. Is there anything else you would like to share with me today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, I think that covers it. I'm feeling relieved now, thanks.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that. Thank you for your time, Kathleen. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
